attributes.action: rebuke the Archbishop of Canterbury for selling out the religion of this country by opening the door to aspects of  Sharia Law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a christian country, all who live here should acknowledge this. many Moslems have come to live here and we positively tolerate their differences. We will NOT, however, change what we are fundamentally - A CHRISTIAN COUNTRY. We have no wish to change and adapt to Islam.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
